data.description:
It is a application that allows you to experience the driving range of golf at home. You can check your swing on VR by holding the controller instead of the golf club and swinging. You can also set the controller on a golf club for practice and swing. In that case, use the position adjustment function of the controller.

Currently installed functions

1. Tutorial
2. Range mode
・Swing data display
・Swing record
・Swing playback
・Setting change
3. Game mode
・Balloon split
・Building target
・Driving contest
・Closest to the pin
・play 1 Hole
4. Lesson mode
・Slice correction 01
・Slice correction 02
・Hand floats
5. Round Play Mode
・GDO Chigasaki Golf Links
6. Optional
・Vibration setting
・Club position adjustment
・Ball＆Ballistic color change
7.Language change
・English
・Japanese

Please note that everything is under development.

changelog.change_log:
ラウンド機能
　〇ミニマップ追加
　　ラウンド全体図と弾道、プレイヤー位置の表示を追加

　〇WaterHazard対応改善
　　ドロップ位置の追加（特定のドロップ位置がある場合にはそちらに移動します）
　　動作バグの改善（当たっていないのに池に落ちる判定の修正）

オンライン機能（試験導入中）
　〇Metaアバターの追加
　　オンライン機能時にクラブだけだったアバターをMeta社製の
　　アバターに置き換え
　〇線共有機能追加
　　試験的にオンラインユーザ同士で共有できる線（Bボタンで引ける）
　　を追加、今のところは削除機能は無し

全体
　〇当たり判定アシスト機能追加
　　ボールのクラブへの当たりやすさの範囲設定を追加
　　OFFにすると当たり判定はクラブと同じ大きさとなり
　　ONにするとクラブよりも当たり判定を大きくできる
　　数字により大きさを変更
Fixed a bug that clubs that do not match the distance are selected when reset in round mode.
Return to curve treatment of the ball

Balloon refactoring
Game mode background music
Building background changes
Refactoring of HandController

Putter mode added
Putter grit added to round mode
Added swing playback slider in range mode

Unity version 2020.3.20f1 → 2021.3.9f1
OculusIntegration 1.52.1 → 1.75.0
Fixed bug with ball movement in round mode
Fixed automatic club change in round mode
Optimization of driving contests
Can select which controller to use

UI transparency process
Player object prefab
Raised OB line
Fixed Waterhazard processing for Itoigawa 8h

Addition of Itoigawa Country Club course
 Addition of golf club types
 Detailed specifications of round mode changed.
 Left-handed clubs can be used with right-handed controllers

Left-handed
Improvement of round mode hit difficulty
Added putting practice to range mode.
Other minor bug fixes

Additional holes 8-9 at GDO Chigasaki Golf Links
Define the course in round mode.
